level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-194
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-194, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1521.09.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 6-194, see Mayor's Order 87-145, June 19, 1987.
Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 9-157, the "Tissue Transplantation Distribution Amendment Act of 1992", see Mayor's Order 93-61, May 12, 1993.
